content: granny cow abbreviations chain - chain space - space slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet blo - back loop only flo - front loop only round - round skip - skip st s - stich es increase - increase decrease - decrease yo - yarn over * -- work instructions following * as many more times as specified in addition to first time single_crochet decrease - insert hook into next st yo draw up a loop insert hook into next st yo draw up a loop yo draw through remaining loops on hook double_crochet decrease - yo insert hook into next stitch yo draw up a loop yo draw hook through two of the loops on hook yo insert hook into next stitch yo draw up a loop yo draw hook through two of the loops on hook yo draw through remaining loops on hook markers - markers are used to specify where a round begins and ends use a small piece of contrasting yarn or a small safety pin placed in the stitch before the first stitch of each round move the marker as you go back or front loop only - work only in stitches marked by arrows below material list worsted weight yarn in the following white - 5 ounces black - 3 ounces country rose - 4 ounces crochet hook size g tapestry needle 12 mm animal eyes 1 pair doll wire rim doll glasses body warning choking hazard due to small parts if you are making this item for a child under the age of 3 years please embroider facial features and eliminate the glasses round 1 with white yarn chain 2 work 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join to first single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not turn 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet and in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 4 *single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 36 single_crochet round 5-6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 36 single_crochet round 7 *single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 54 single_crochet round 8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 54 single_crochet round 9 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 72 single_crochet round 10 working in blo single_crochet around 72 single_crochet round 11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 72 single_crochet round 12 *single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet decrease repeat from * around 60 single_crochet round 13-40 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 60 single_crochet round 41 *single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease repeat from * around 40 single_crochet round 42 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease repeat from * around 30 single_crochet neck round 43 *single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease repeat from * around 20 single_crochet round 44 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 single_crochet firmly stuff body head round 45 *single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet
